value:
The name Walhart is synonymous
with conquest. You must peer into
his soul if you wish to keep pace!

There is no shortage of whiskered
warriors in Askr, it would seem.
My competition is fierce.

My journey to another world has in
no way diminished my need to
maintain a strict grooming routine.

So long as I remain unshorn, I am
invincible. If my foes wish to defeat
me, they shall have to shave me first!

My hairs stand on end—every one of
them! This beard shows my constant
readiness for battle.

I, Cervantes—the unparalleled, the
undefeated, the unshaven—am now
in $Nf's service.

You stand before an undefeated and
invincible general. Go on—bask in the
glory of these whiskers!

I've not shaved since my very first
battle. And have I ever lost? No!
Not even once!
Hm? What could this portend?

Do you see these whiskers? Look
closely! They are jumping for joy!

I am General Cervantes of Valm. My
foes shall buckle before me like a
flimsy belt around the waist of defeat!

I once had dreams of commanding a
nation myself... But Walhart? Aye, he
dreams bigger.$k$pHe would rule the entire world! Mine
is nothing compared to the moxie of
the Conqueror.$k$pI am but a single hair on the beard
of a flea in his great moustache! So,
why did I follow him? Why indeed...$k$pI wanted to taste the thrill of being
part of something bigger than myself.
The Order of Heroes is similar.$k$pIf true heroes from worlds apart join
together as one, there is nothing they
cannot accomplish.$k$pThus, my whiskers and I remain at
your disposal. Let us see how far
we can go together!
Ah, the anticipation!
Today, we make history!
You shall buckle here!
These whiskers are undefeated!
To die in obscurity...
You think you can beat me—General Cervantes, the unparalleled? The undefeated? The unshaven?!
Are you trying to touch these whiskers? I cannot say I blame you.
Walhart shall become king of all the world!
Since my very first proper battle, I have been unshorn.
We will show them the meaning of fear. Not beard, you fool. FEAR!
I shall follow Walhart to the ends of the earth.
Let us face one another, as equals, as human beings! Let me peer into your soul!
Ha-ha!
What? No!
My whiskers are ready!
